name: integrations-tests-latest
description: Integration tests for the latest version of Typescript
author: monounity

scripts.copy: clear && rm -rf coverage && cp ../index.js node_modules/karma-typescript && cp -R ../lib/* node_modules/karma-typescript/lib/
scripts.dev: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.dev-angular2: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.angular2.js
scripts.dev-react: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.react.js
scripts.dev-core: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.core.js
scripts.dev-no-module: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.no.module.js
scripts.dev-emptyfile: npm run copy && karma start karma.conf.emptyfile.js
scripts.copy-win: rd /S /Q coverage & copy /Y ..\index.js .\node_modules\karma-typescript\index.js && xcopy /Y /R /S ..\lib\* node_modules\karma-typescript\lib\ & cls
scripts.dev-win: npm run copy-win & karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.dev-angular2-win: npm run copy-win && karma start karma.conf.angular2.js
scripts.dev-react-win: npm run copy-win && karma start karma.conf.react.js
scripts.dev-core-win: npm run copy-win && karma start karma.conf.core.js
scripts.dev-no-module-win: npm run copy-win && karma start karma.conf.no.module.js
scripts.dev-emptyfile-win: npm run copy-win && karma start karma.conf.emptyfile.js
